about_the_game:
Dashpong is a unique and fast-paced local multiplayer game. High energy and sometimes chaotic, it's the perfect arcade game to play with your friends!
This game is multiplayer only, there's no single player experience yet.

You move freely on the map and create physics based paddles when dashing. Push the ball into your opponents' goal by throwing your paddles across the map!
Dashpong is easy to pickup but hard to master, it’s the perfect game to have fun with your friend and challenge them.

Play the classic mode, with just you and the paddles or the arcade mode with tons of special modes bending the rules to renew your experience and challenge your skills:
  • Multiple balls
  • Changing gravity
  • Time rewind
  • Destructible environment
  • Power ups (speed, force, longer dash, etc...)
  • And 20+ more!

DEFEND YOUR GOALS

Create paddles at the last moment to protect your goal!

USE THE ENVIRONMENT

Use the environment to your advantage!

CREATE PADDLES

Dashing to create paddle can save you, but be careful, it can be turned against you!

UP TO 4 PLAYERS

Do all of the above up to 4 players locally. More people, more chaos, more fun!

MANY MAPS

Small goals, weird angles, obstacles, all kinds of maps!

MANY SPECIAL MODES

Rewind, portals, gravity wells, invisible paddles, and many, many more!

CHANGE COLORS

Choose your team colors!




  • 10+ maps
  • 1V1 and 2V2 mode
  • 25+ Special modes with power ups, crazy environments and twisted rules
  • Team color selection: choose the color that suits your team the best
  • Custom mode: You control everything: maps, player size, strength, number of paddles and balls, etc..

Accessibility

Here is a list of the accessibility features in Dashpong
  • Tunable player's color
  • Localized in different languages (see languages on Steam)
  • Tunable controller vibration
  • Tunable screenshake
In the custom mode, you can change many parameters:
  • Player size
  • Player speed
  • Paddle number
  • Dash duration
  • Hit strength
  • Ball size
  • Ball number

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64bits linux distribution
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series or similar
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or similar
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Dashpong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series or similar
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or similar
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Dashpong is a high energy arcade local multiplayer game where you dash all around the maps at full speed. Create paddles to defend your goal and shoot the ball at your opponent to score. Enjoy the game up to 4 players in local multiplayer.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Hindi
